alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:06PM CDT until August 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CLARK COUNTY... At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hatfield, or 7 miles south of Neillsville, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 55 mph winds near Spencer at 655 pm. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Clark County, including the following locations... Ballard Road And Pray Avenue, Wildcat Mound, Highway 10 And 12, Highway 95 And 73, Highway 10 And Bald Peak Road, Bruce Mound and Snyder Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
